start: You must have slept for days. You woke up and found yourself in a strange place. The wall in front of you says 'collect 5 eyeballs and you can leave'. You think it must be a prank but you decided to play along.

main room.description: You are at the entrance of a room that looks like someone's living room
main room.detail: There is a coffee table with a small box at the center of the room, there's also a chair in the corner. There's also some trash just laying around. This room is very dusty. It looks like there's a door leading to the west and the south.

small box.detail: This is a very strange looking box and it seems to be easy to open.

contains.eyeball: You found an eyeball. It looks just as gross as you'd imagined.
contains.key: You found a key but there don't seem to be locks anywhere

small room.description: You are in the small room. It's so tiny that there's only space for one person to turn around.
small room.detail: Not much going on here. Seems more space between rooms instead of a room. There's a door to the north, the south and the east as well.

red room.description: You are in a red room. The walls are violently red it's almost agitating.
red room.detail: There are pillows laying around randomly. Feels like this used to be a bedroom but now the bed is gone. You can also see a sack leaning against the wall with the window. The windows are shut so you can't see what out there.
